column5: Oh my, the vicious things lol....  Burt
Go ahead, I dare ya, stick your hand in there!  Good use for an underused species.
So then, do you eat the piranhas.
Great! one of my least favorite species! they compete with smallies for food. Now then, have you tried feeding the carp?
What a waste of fine cuisine. I only keep the big ones because there's only the tenderloin meat to get in cleaning. Boil it in salt water and dip in butter. Mmmmmm.
Awe you chopped them up. I thought you just tossed the entire drum into the tank alive. !!  dsn

Piranha-Fury.com  Good web forum for them!. I use to own Piranha`s for years! Great Fish!  May I ask what size of tank you have t house 26 Piranha`s in it !?!! :| Must be pretty damn large or you are really over stalking!!
piranha fury is where I picked up the last bunch, the tank is a 240 gallon DIY plywood, 72x36x24 tall, you can check out the DIY build here if you like
Nice tank big too!! Ever think about housing a 13''+ Rhom in that bad boy! :D:D  Do you post on P-fury alot?
